alert.note: Alert for Crowley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 6:32PM MDT until August 03 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL CROWLEY COUNTY... At 632 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Truckton to 17 miles southwest of Forder to 12 miles north of Olney Springs, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Ordway and Sugar City. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
